title: Summer Split Week 1 Patch
body: According to the LCS Ruleset the first week of Summer LCS should be played in patch 5.9. Is there a red who can confirm this? Not sure if it was 5.8 because of any special circumstances with it being the first week of the season or otherwise.

replies.body: I can already see Sneaky picking Ashe again like he used to.
Come on pros,Ashe could use a championship skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Jeddy017,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=KgiH6KKw,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-05-19T23:42:33.184+0000)
>
> Come on pros,Ashe could use a championship skin.

Well to be fair me don't like any preexisting championship skins as is but alas the point is understood.
